key.name: panel-enabled
key.description: When true, the extension changes the top panel color by layout.

key.name: dock-enabled
key.description: When true, the extension changes the Ubuntu Dock background color by layout.

key.name: dock-flag-enabled
key.description: When true, a narrow strip appears on the right side of the Ubuntu Dock background.

key.name: dock-flag-width
key.description: Width in pixels of the right-side dock strip.

key.name: dock-flag-offset
key.description: Offset in pixels from the right edge of the dock to the strip.

key.name: color-en
key.description: RGBA color used when the EN layout is active.

key.name: color-ru
key.description: RGBA color used when the RU layout is active.
